title: (x) Table Tops swirly script - Balmoral {Tiff}
content:
Hi everyone.  
Here is a sample of the font needed.  
Thanks!

| --- | --- |

author: wandar

comments.content: That is [Balmoral](http://web.archive.org/web/20131022013009/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/balmoral/) from Fontek or at least that is how I remember it. But, MyFonts has it from Linotype and Scangraphhic.
